CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "ISAMSX16VP",'Extras: Wall Mounting Kit and MDF Cables. This tab makes only visible the MDF cables if the deployable configuration is Indoor or Outdoor IP55. Licenses: some mandatory licenses are shown for your information, being mandatory they cannot be unselected. Additionally other Optional Licenses related to particular functionalities are also available.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "ISAMSX",'Extras: Optional Wall Mounting Kit is available. No specific cables are in Nokia Portfolio. Power and copper pair cables should be provided by customer.Licenses: some mandatory Licenses are shown for your information, being mandatory they cannot be unselected. Additionally other Optional Licenses related to particular functionality are also available.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "ISAMSX48U",'Despite being a Sealed Box the 7367 SX-48U provides with a considerable variety of options in terms of power supply type (AC, DC), functionality (with or without POTS splitters) and network topology (uplink redundancy, subtending, GPON uplink). Note also that the selection of the previous mentioned 7367 SX attributes impacts on the options available in the next tabs. Please click on below attribute question-marks to obtain detailed information about these dependencies.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7705SARHm",'Please select the outdoor enclosure suitable for your installation environment and the antennas required for connectivity.','7362DF 16GW for NAM is supported by starter KITs with different options: AC or DC powered, including a Dust filter, a mounting Kit, a power cable, an Uplink and an XFP.'))))
CustomField.label: Guidance
